thread.title_full: Mark Worthington Jewellers reviewed by Paul

author: Paul
title: Paul
text:
I have recently purchased a pre owned Rolex Date just from Mark Worthington jewellers.
The standard of the items being sold is extremely high. The watch (despite its age) is immaculate.
I part exchanged an old watch and was given a slightly below market value. I felt this was fair given that the guys would have to service it and bring it up to standard in order to sell. I also made them an offer which was met half way. Again, I felt this was fair.
Overall, I left with the impression that Mark Worthington jewellers are extremely proud of their high standards and will only sell items which have been presented to a high standard. They are also very knowledgeable about their business.
After a few days I noticed a slight metallic rattle. I called the guys who promptly suggested to send it back to be looked at by their work shop. I was relieved that they were keen to ensure I was happy with my purchase rather than just a sale.
I would recommend these guys if you are in the market for a used watch. Their prices are fair for the quality of the stock they sell. The sale was a friendly but highly professional experience.
